00068 /*
00069  * This file is reserved to specify architecture dependant
00070  * configuration and is currently used as a placeholder 
00071  * when not using the Configurator.
00072  */
00073 
00074 /*
00075 ** Determine board defaults.
00076 **/

00078

00081 #endif

00084 #define AVR_GCC
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #if !defined(MCU_ATMEGA128) && !defined(MCU_ATMEGA2560) && !defined(MCU_ATMEGA2561)

00090 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega2561__) || defined(ATMega2561)
